com.github.dandelion.core

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.Context

  • public class Context
extends Object

    Holds the whole Dandelion context.

    This class is in charge of discovering and storing several configuration points, such as the configured RequestCache implementation or the active AssetProcessors.

    There should be only one instance of this class per JVM.

    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

      • Context

        public Context(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

        Public constructor.

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()

        Performs all the required initializations of the Dandelion context.

      • initComponents

        public void initComponents()

      • initConfiguration

        public void initConfiguration(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

        Returns an implementation of ConfigurationLoader using the following strategy:

        1. Check first if the dandelion.confloader.class system property is set and tries to instantiate it
        2. Otherwise, instantiate the StandardConfigurationLoader which reads properties files

      • initAssetVersioning

        public void initAssetVersioning()

        Initializes the asset versioning for the whole application.

      • initBundleLoaders

        public void initBundleLoaders()

        Initializes the BundleLoaders in a particular order:

        1. First, the VendorBundleLoader which loads all "vendor bundles"
        2. Then, all service providers of the BundleLoader SPI present in the classpath
        3. Finally the DandelionBundleLoader which loads all "user bundles"

      • initExtraLoaders

        public void initExtraLoaders()

        Initializes all PreLoaders, intended to feed the bundle graph using generated bundles.

      • initRequestFlashDataCache

        public void initRequestFlashDataCache()

        Initialize the request flash data cache only if Thymeleaf is present in the classpath.

      • initRequestCache

        public void initRequestCache()

        Initialize the service provider of RequestCache to use for caching.

      • initAssetLocators

        public void initAssetLocators()

        Initializes all service providers of the AssetLocator SPI. The order doesn't matter.

      • initAssetProcessors

        public void initAssetProcessors()

        Initializes all service providers of the AssetProcessor SPI and stores them all in the processorsMap.

        If minification is enabled, the activeProcessors is filled with default service providers.

      • initBundleStorage

        public void initBundleStorage()

        Initializes the BundleStorage by using all configured BundleLoaders.

        Once loader, some checks are performed on the BundleStorage.

      • initAssetStorage

        public void initAssetStorage()

      • initMBean

        public void initMBean(javax.servlet.FilterConfig filterConfig)

        If JMX is enabled, initializes a MBean allowing to reload bundles and access cache.

        Parameters:
        filterConfig - The servlet filter configuration.

      • initHandlers

        public void initHandlers()

        Initializes the handler chains to be invoked in the DandelionFilter to preprocess requests and postprocess responses.

      • initDebugMenus

        public void initDebugMenus()

      • isDevProfileEnabled

        public boolean isDevProfileEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the current Profile is set to "dev" or any other aliases present in Profile.DEV_ALIASES, false otherwise.

      • isProdProfileEnabled

        public boolean isProdProfileEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the current Profile is set to "prod" or any other aliases present in Profile.PROD_ALIASES, false otherwise.

      • getActiveVersioningStrategy

        public AssetVersioningStrategy getActiveVersioningStrategy()
        Returns:
        the active AssetVersioningStrategy.

      • getVersioningStrategyMap

        Returns:
        the map of all available AssetVersioningStrategy.

      • getPreHandlerChain

        public HandlerChain getPreHandlerChain()
        Returns:
        the HandlerChain to be invoked in the DandelionFilter to preprocess requests.

        public HandlerChain getPostHandlerChain()
        Returns:
